original_title: Les films du dés-apparaître - #1: Mes cheuvs dans ta
overview: "Les films du dés-apparaître" is a collection of films aiming to descend toward the deepness of the film's technical properties. Grain, negative/positive, continuity/discontinuity, movement/steadiness and others constituent oppositions are dismembered in a progressive and recurrent way, or on the model of the methodical determination with which the vulture emaciates his prey. "#1 - Mes cheuvs dans ta" is the first step of the dismembering.
title: Les films du dés-apparaître - #1: Mes cheuvs dans ta
